mapper.sql: profileid, state, campaignType, recordType, byday, quantity, opttime
mapper.select: select t.recordType,sum(t.quantity) quantity,min(t.opttime) opttime from t_amz_adv_sumalltype t left join t_amz_adv_profile p on t.profileid=p.id left join t_amz_adv_auth a on a.id=p.advauthId and a.disable = 0 where a.shopid=#{shopid,jdbcType=CHAR} and t.byday= #{byday,jdbcType=CHAR} and (`state`='enabled' or `state`='paused' ) group by t.recordType

select t.recordType,sum(t.quantity) quantity,min(t.opttime) opttime from t_amz_adv_sumalltype t left join t_amz_adv_profile p on t.profileid=p.id left join t_amz_adv_auth a on a.id=p.advauthId and a.disable = 0 where a.shopid=#{shopid,jdbcType=CHAR} and t.byday= #{byday,jdbcType=CHAR} and (`state`='enabled') group by t.recordType
